cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.udpbroadcast.jdeecoextension

Class UDPBroadcastHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.network.AbstractHost
      • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.udpbroadcast.jdeecoextension.UDPBroadcastHost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.network.HostKnowledgeDataHandler, cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.network.NetworkInterface, cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.scheduler.CurrentTimeProvider

    public class UDPBroadcastHost
extends cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.network.AbstractHost
implements cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.network.NetworkInterface
    This is an implementation of AbstractHost class from JDEECo library. It is the actual extension adding support for UDP broadcast Knowledge Cloning.

    This class represents the layer between JDEECo and physical UDP network communication

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2014 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz

        public UDPBroadcastHost(java.lang.String ipAddress,

        Parameters:
        ipAddress - Local host's IP address
        udpBroadcast - Implementation of UDPBroadcast as the physical networking layer

      • packetReceived

        public void packetReceived(byte[] packet,
                  double rssi)
        This method bridges the physical network layer to the JDEECo knowledge cloning layer. It has to be called when new packet is received from the network

        Specified by:
        packetReceived in interface cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.network.NetworkInterface

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket(byte[] packet,
              java.lang.String recipient)
        This method bridges the JDEECo knowledge cloning layer to the physical network layer. JDEECo knoledge cloning layer should call this method to send UDP packets to the network

        Specified by:
        sendPacket in interface cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.network.NetworkInterface
